data.message:
Two content hearts bent.
A Heaven sent angel.
Man deep in sin.

Love and hope.
All these two ever wanted 
Was to be happy in the end.

A poet . No . A human being.
That is lost to the world he knows and he knows it.

The only hold.
Is This equally 
Lost soul.
Shines. A divine glow.
Everytime i see that girl.
I just break down from the bones.

The only home i ever known.
Now i have to go. Find myself.
That me i seemed to have lost somewhere down the road.

Im far from a writer of course.
But im not making this for some grammy award. 
If i feel an emotion .i get my pen. And think of a cord.

I only share my thoughts with you. 
And yes at times. Im crazy rude.
But girl your my medicine.
Without it. Im a crazy fool.

I cant get enough of you
Its like craving the best food. im never full. 

And no i dont have to always be lyrical. 

But my thoughts are tangled.
And it helps me think things through.  makes them clearer to Speak them to someone so beautiful.
